music.project: Pomeranian tries to be a Police

tracks.name: Main Theme - Inspirational
tracks.description: Orchestral theme that plays throughout the video
tracks.prompt: Create an inspirational orchestral soundtrack for a 2-minute animated video about a small Pomeranian with a big dream to become a police officer. The music should start soft and cozy (Act 1), build up with determination (Act 2), become epic and action-packed (Act 3), and finally transition to a peaceful, satisfied conclusion (Act 4). Mix adorable cute elements with heroic, epic orchestration. Include dramatic crescendos for action sequences. Total duration: 120 seconds.

tracks.name: Action Sequence Music
tracks.description: High-energy music for the chase and action sequences (Act 3)
instruments: Orchestral strings with strong bow attacks
tracks.prompt: Create intense, epic action music for a 30-second chase sequence. A tiny Pomeranian police officer is chasing a 'criminal'. The music should be heroic and dramatic, with strong brass and strings, building tension. Include dramatic crescendos and stabs. Should feel cinematic and action-movie-like while still maintaining adorable charm.

tracks.name: Peaceful Conclusion
tracks.description: Soft, relaxing music for the ending sequence (Act 4)
tracks.prompt: Create soft, peaceful closing music for a 30-second ending sequence. A tiny exhausted Pomeranian police officer comes home, takes a bath, and goes to sleep, satisfied with his day. The music should be relaxing, warm, and hopeful. Include soft piano, strings, and ambient elements. Should evoke feelings of accomplishment and peace.

sfx_library.description: Various dog barks (proud, investigative, victory, tired)

scripts.text: Meet Max, a small Pomeranian with a very big dream...
Today would be different. Today he would be... a police officer.
He had been waiting for this moment his whole life.
He had to look impeccable for his first day.
First, breakfast. A police officer needs energy.
And lots of determination.
The uniform. The badge of honor.
On the way to the police station.
Each step brought him closer to his destination.
Finally. The police station.
Time to work.
Transformed. Officer Max was ready.
First: surveillance. Max was prepared for anything.
Crime scene analysis. Nothing would escape his eagle eye.
Wait. What was that?
The chase is on!
Nothing would stop him.
Crime solved!
Duty fulfilled. But the exhaustion... was real.
A long day. Very long.
At home. Finally.
A bath to wash away the day.
Tomorrow would be another day...
But for now, he rested with the satisfaction of a job well done. Max's dream... was reality.
